description: meta info used by the EP parser, all names are expected to start with castep_

metaInfos.description: Forces on the atoms as minus gradient of energy_total, including forces' unitary-transformation (rigid body) filtering and including constraints, if present. The derivatives with respect to displacements of the nuclei in the gradient are evaluated according to the coordinate system defined in coordinate_system. In addition, these forces are obtained by filtering out the unitary transformations (translations of the center of mass and rigid rotations of the whole system, when non periodic), atom_forces_raw for the unfiltered counterpart. Furthermore, forces due to constraints like fixed atoms, distances, angles, dihedrals, and so on, are here included (see atom_forces_raw for the unfiltered counterpart).
metaInfos.name: x_castep_atom_forces

metaInfos.description: Storing atomic positions in fractional coordinates
metaInfos.name: x_castep_atom_positions

metaInfos.description: cutoff at iteration 0 of geometry optimisation
metaInfos.name: x_castep_basis_set_planewave_cutoff_iteration_0

metaInfos.description: Temporary storing plane wave cutoff as string
metaInfos.name: x_castep_basis_set_planewave_cutoff

metaInfos.description: XC functional definition in CASTEP convention
metaInfos.name: x_castep_functional_type

metaInfos.description: XC functional weight in CASTEP convention

metaInfos.description: Index for number of iterations in geometry optimisation

metaInfos.name: x_castep_geometry_stress_com_tolerance

metaInfos.name: x_castep_optimised_atom_positions

metaInfos.name: x_castep_max_iter_store

metaInfos.name: x_castep_crystal_point_group

metaInfos.name: x_castep_total_dispersion_corrected_energy

metaInfos.name: energy_total_scf_iteration_list
